ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json var gatewayResponse = vars.gatewayResponse var originalRequest = vars.originalRequest --- { paymentId: gatewayResponse.transactionId default ("PAY-" ++ uuid()[0 to 7]), policyId: originalRequest.policyId, status: if (upper(gatewayResponse.status default "") == "AUTHORIZED" or upper(gatewayResponse.status default "") == "APPROVED" or upper(gatewayResponse.status default "") == "SUCCESS") "AUTHORIZED" else if (upper(gatewayResponse.status default "") == "DECLINED") "DECLINED" else gatewayResponse.status default "AUTHORIZED", authorizationCode: gatewayResponse.authorizationCode default gatewayResponse.authCode default ("AUTH-" ++ uuid()[0 to 7]), message: if (upper(gatewayResponse.status default "") == "AUTHORIZED" or upper(gatewayResponse.status default "") == "APPROVED" or upper(gatewayResponse.status default "") == "SUCCESS") "Payment authorized successfully" else if (upper(gatewayResponse.status default "") == "DECLINED") "Payment was declined" else gatewayResponse.message default "Payment processed" }

logger.doc:name: Log Payment Response
logger.message: #['Payment processed successfully - CorrelationId: ' ++ (vars.correlationId default 'N/A') ++ ' - PaymentId: ' ++ (payload.paymentId default 'N/A') ++ ' - Status: ' ++ (payload.status default 'N/A')]
